# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cee4-102">Bandeja de entrada vacía</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cee4-103">**Mi bandeja de entrada está vacía**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-103">**My inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cee4-104">Algunos complementos del explorador Firefox pueden impedir que se cargue la bandeja de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cee4-105">Visite soporte técnico de Firefox para obtener información sobre cómo [deshabilitar o quitar complementos](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [Disable or remove Add-ons](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cee4-106">**Deseo vaciar mi bandeja de entrada**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cee4-107">Si quiere vaciar la bandeja de entrada y eliminar todo el correo electrónico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="3cee4-108">Seleccionar el círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="3cee4-109">junto a [bandeja de entrada](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) en la parte superior de la lista de mensajes para seleccionar todos los mensajes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3cee4-110">En la parte superior de la página, seleccione **carpeta vacía** (o vacía, en blanco **centrada** / **otra** si la bandeja de entrada prioritarios está activada).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3cee4-111">Seleccione **eliminar todo**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3cee4-112">Para purgar todos los mensajes eliminados, abra la [carpeta elementos eliminados](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) y seleccione **vaciar** > **eliminar todo**y, a continuación, seleccione **recuperar los elementos eliminados de esta carpeta** en la parte superior de la página y volver a seleccionar la **carpeta vacía** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cee4-113">Para obtener más información, vea [eliminar correo electrónico en Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cee4-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
